channel.title: Run.bat not working suddenly?
channel.description:
I have a slight problem whenever I try running ANY server I decide to play on. For example: Say I wanted to download (Whatever)Scape and I extract all the files correctly and I then click Run.bat or Play.bat or whatever its called on that server it doesn't work. It either does: A. Closes immediately OR B. It says:
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
Now, I'm pretty sure this isn't an error with Java because web clients work. Please help, THANKS!

item.title: Run.bat not working suddenly?
item.dc:creator: @nerdfighter nerdfighter
item.description:
@nerdfighter wrote:

I never had any, do I need any of those to play on someone’s server?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 03, 2009, 11:55:04 am[/size][hr]Okay, I edited my environmental variables and everything works, I can play a server now.

BUT

ipconfig doesn’t work in CMD.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat not working suddenly?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Your enviromental variables aren’t set properly.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat not working suddenly?
item.dc:creator: @nerdfighter nerdfighter
item.description:
@nerdfighter wrote:

This isn’t my server its doing on but in general any server. Here is the information you asked for that is currently in the servers Run.bat I’m trying to play on now.

@echo off
title Rawgamerz
cd Files
java -Xmx500m -cp . Class51 30 0 highmem members 32
pause

It worked yesterday and I don’t even have any CLASSPATH or PATH variables.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat not working suddenly?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

click on edit on the batch file and post it here.
Change your classpath variable to: C:\Program Files\Java\jre6

for more info read http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat not working suddenly?
item.dc:creator: @nerdfighter nerdfighter
item.description:
@nerdfighter wrote:

I have a slight problem whenever I try running ANY server I decide to play on.

For example:

Say I wanted to download (Whatever)Scape and I extract all the files correctly and I then click Run.bat or Play.bat or whatever its called on that server it doesn’t work. It either does:

A. Closes immediately
OR
B. It says:

'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
Now, I'm pretty sure this isn't an error with Java because web clients work.

Please help,

THANKS!

Read full topic
